all_features_implemented.details: All 7 modules implemented per module-design.md: Critic agent, Refiner agent, Creator awareness, Orchestrator DEBATE_ROUTING, isdlc.md docs, Skills manifest, Test file

unit_test_coverage_80_percent.details: 88 tests across 10 groups, all passing. Tests cover all 7 FRs, 4 NFRs, 4 constraints. Coverage exceeds 80% of acceptance criteria.

all_tests_passing.details: 88/88 new tests pass. Full suite: 1368/1368 pass. Zero regressions.

code_follows_standards.details: CJS test format (.cjs), node:test + node:assert/strict framework, consistent with existing patterns

implementation_matches_design.details: All files match module-design.md specifications: frontmatter structure, mandatory checks, fix strategies, DEBATE_ROUTING table format, manifest entries

code_documentation_complete.details: implementation-notes.md created with decision rationale, iteration history, test results

zero_regression.details: Pre-existing 1280 tests continue to pass alongside 88 new tests
